div.bibl: Sinai Congregation, Executive Board Minutes, Mar. 28, 1887.

body.p: The President, Mr. Gatzert, as a committee of one, previously appointed, reported that he had an interview with our minister, the Rev. Dr. Hirsch in regard to celebrating the holidays on the Sundays preceeding or following, and that the Doctor was firm and inexorable in his views, that the came could and would not be done with his consent. The matter was therefore abandoned.
